## ITT-ED001-240800-Structure 404 Reconstruction
 Georges Dumont, Technical Writer
September 06, 2023 

## Tender Details

**Tender Reference**
WS4199650127

**Publication Date**
September 6, 2023

**Date and Time of Tenders Closing**
September 22, 2023, 02:00 PM AST

This tender was announced in accordance with the Supply Manual and is open to all qualified contractors.

## Description of Work

**Work Summary**
The work under this contract involves the reconstruction of Structure #404, located at McAuleys Shore in Queens County, PEI.

**Delivery and Completion Date**
The Contractor shall complete the work prior to October 1st, 2024.

**Estimated Cost Range**
The estimated cost for this project ranges from $1,000,001 to $5,000,000, inclusive of HST.

## Instructions to Bidders

* Bidders may submit their tenders in French or English.
* Bidders must satisfy the following selection criteria: 
	+ Lowest Price.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation after receiving notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
* Bidders must make their request within 15 working days from the date of the notification.
* Bidders may direct their request to the Contracting Authority, Sonia Stockman, at sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Attachments

No attachments are provided.

## Important Notes

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders with questions or concerns are advised to review the document in its entirety, and contact the Contracting Authority if the issue is not resolved.
